text: Ivan Simon Cary Elwes (; born 26 October 1962) is a British actor and writer. He is best known for his leading movie roles as Westley in The Princess Bride (1987), Robin Hood in Robin Hood: Men in Tights (1993), and Dr. Lawrence Gordon in the Saw movie series. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from London Category:British movie actors Category:British stage actors Category:British television actors Category:British voice actors Category:Writers from London
title: Cary Elwes
